ropkgs
=======

`ropkgs` is an R client to discover and install rOpensci packages.

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sckott/ropkgs")
```

```{r}
library("ropkgs")
```

## List all packages

```{r eval=FALSE}
adfadf
```

## Search for a package

```{r eval=FALSE}
adfadf
```

## Install packages

```{r eval=FALSE}
afafasf
```

## Uninstall packages

```{r eval=FALSE}
uninstall
```
